summarize working time

Source: R/timekeeping.R
ft_tk_summarize_time.Rd

summarize working time

Usage

ft_tk_summarize_time(
  log_file = ft_tk_logfile(),
  collab_q = "",
  project_q = "",
  category_q = "",
  units = "days",
  min_cumulative = 120,
  return_type = "n-days"
)

Arguments

log_file

the log file to use (ft_tk_logfile)

units

what to summarize to? Default is "days"

min_cumulative

minimum number of minutes to count as one "unit"

return_type

whether to give the number of days, or specific time durations by day.

collab

the collaborator to select

project

the project

category

the category of work

Value

data.frame

See also

Other Timekeeping: ft_setup_timekeeping(), ft_tk_check_log(), ft_tk_get_categories(), ft_tk_logfile(), ft_tk_logtask(), ft_tk_parselog(), ft_tk_removelast()
